thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text:
I normally get irritated from using products at the store, so I started using all organic pads and tampons that I would buy at our natural store down the road. The thing is I was spending close to $20 just for 10 panty liners.
With Lola I'm definitely getting my money worth and don't get irritated down there at all. I love that it ships right to my door every month; so I never forget to buy them and have the privacy of receiving them right at home. I love it! I will be staying with Lola for a very long time:)
